title: What topic should I cover in an ethics essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing an ethics paper can present some unique challenges. For the most part, the paper will be written like any other essay or research paper, but there are some key differences. An ethics paper will generally require you to argue for a specific position rather than simply present an overview of an issue. Arguing this position will also involve presenting counterarguments and then refuting them. The main consideration to be covered in an ethics essay is this: am I qualified because of the way I think and act in my own life to write about anything having to do with ethics? Before I investigate another ethics I must investigate my own. The topic to be covered in an ethics essay? How qualified am I to comment about ethics?
